CustomField.description: Only applies to non-Legacy Payment Methods. Determines how Hard and Soft Credits are calculated: Either Payment Amount (Gift + Non-Gift) OR Gift Amount Payer Hard Credit / Non-Gift Amount Payer Soft Credit / Payment Amount Relationship Soft Credit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only applies to non-Legacy Payment Methods. Determines how Hard and Soft Credits are calculated: Either Payment Amount (Gift + Non-Gift) OR Gift Amount Payer Hard Credit / Non-Gift Amount Payer Soft Credit / Payment Amount Relationship Soft Credit.
CustomField.label: Hard/Soft Credit Calculation Type

value.fullName: Gift Amount / Non-Gift Amount / Payment Amount
value.label: Gift Amount / Non-Gift Amount / Payment Amount
